Articles.Content:
So yesterday I tried to update 0.15 to 0.16 and the uploader bugged out on me to the point where the game wouldn\'t application would not open. I re-bought/downloaded the game thinking it would automatically be 0.16. Ive done this more than once now and for some reason it still only downloads 0.15. Does anyone know if or how there is a way to use the in game updater to go from 0.15 to 0.16? Help would be greatly appreciated

BlackMagic

It worked for me, eventually. The server was running very slow for a time due to the traffic, it is cleared now.

I also read that harvestor has recently updated the download link so it should work.

Welcome to the forums!

Happy flying!

Arrrr!

Resident Capt\'n Skunky Impersonator.
Welcome to the forums. The last I saw, the download link was actually for 0.16 (despite showing 0.15).
